Articles.Content:
Duna Tripper 6, a Kerbin-Duna-Kerbin Heavy shuttle/ transport.

It can take 5 tons of cargo to Duna surface and return, probably more but i haven't tested that. All cargo will go under the bottom fuel tank (I'm going to make a dedicated cargo one soon).

http://www./?380cbf8w60213jh

Can go to Duna Surface and back entirely self sustained.

Edited September 10, 2013 by zekes
Cool. Does it require gravity turning to achieve orbit or can you just blast straight up?
i gravity turn to save fuel, but i imagine you can go straight up.... It has soo much delta v one way fights to Laythe are possible!
How many parts is this? Is there more than whats pictured? (Im assuming so)
I like it, but I replaced that ridiculous amount of little pylons on the side with structural beams to save parts. nice ship!

Yeah it was origionally made in 17.0 and when i fixed it to work for 18.0 there wern't I-beams yet. Still works for 19.1....

And yes it has a whole launcher and all, total 460ish parts (lander is only like 150).
Also, does it leave any space junk or do all of the parts that decouple return to the surface?

If you are a good pilot all the junk will crash, if not there will be debree. depends on how you fly it.

^bumping this cause its awesome^

The DT-6 has 500 downloads! Awesome!

Merged from three separate posts

Edited January 8, 2014 by FEichinger
C'mon zekes, you know how this stuff goes...

Heya

Quit the bumping. If your thread doesn't get attention after the first bump, why do you expect that to change with two more bumps?

FEichinger

I guess i bumped this a lot. Whoops.

I loaded the DT6 up today - I'm still not believing it. I'm gonna make some slight changes to it and give it a more efficient lifter, and re-release it. I cannot believe it loaded. File was created on January 29th 2013. TWO YEARS AGO. And it still loads.
